雖然不知道之後還會不會有疫情 但希望老師可以考慮遠距授課，在做完ETP trade show 後知道班上有同學染疫真的很慌張⋯⋯雖然我們都有戴口罩 但不等於不會被感染 謝謝Judy

hi Judy! this is Melody! i really feel so glad to be your student (and class leader) again. though the HW loading was much bigger than Chier's class, i never regretted changing into your class. all the training and lessons are worth it!
真的要選Cheir...上課的內容真的太簡單但是作業又很多，作文的架構也講解的不清楚，不如選涼的
Too much homework. Learn a lot but being exhausted.
